contextId.occurrenceNote: A cubit was about 46 centimeters long. Alternate translation: "18 cubits ... 12 cubits" or "about 8.3 meters ... about 5.5 meters" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bdistance]])
A cubit was about 46 centimeters long. Alternate translation: "5 cubits" or "about 2.3 meters" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-bdistance]])
